full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Reference Number: WS4580482534
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Solicitation Number: WS4580482534
#### Publication Date: **2024-05-15**
#### Tender Closing Date: **2024-06-10T14:00:00**

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Supply and Delivery of Acoustical Tiles, EP765-250015. The tender is for the acquisition of ceiling materials, including the delivery of acoustical tiles, for installation at the Valour Building. Multiple trade agreements are applicable to this tender.

### Brief Overview
The selected bidder will be required to supply and deliver  **[unspecified quantity]**  units of acoustical tiles. The scope of services also includes the installation of the aforementioned products. The tender status is **Expired**.

### Important Dates
* Expected Contract Start Date: **2024-06-04**
* Expected Contract End Date: **2024-08-12**
* Amendment Date: **2024-05-28**

### Contact Information
If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact:
LISA HAMPBEL
Electronically Procurement Consultant
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage 
Gatineau, QC  K1A 0S5
Email:  [lisa.hampel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.hampel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Examination Documents
URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19711229?extsite=MTk3MTEyMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### UNSPSC Codes
* 30161600 - Ceiling materials
* 72101500 - Building maintenance and repair services
* 72120000 - Nonresidential building construction services
* 72152605 - Ceiling erection and repair service
* 76111601 -  Acoustical tile or ceiling cleaning services

To access the tender documents, visit the designated notice URL provided above and ensure to comply with any applicable trade agreements included in the supplier response package. 
Note that the number in the contract is missing in the rewritten entry, and there are many French versions that are not included
